underLine.description: Whether or not to display an underline

mpTips.description: Each Mini Program platform copies the link to the prompt after the pasteboard
mpTips.description_zh: 各个小程序平台把链接复制到粘贴板后的提示语
mpTips.default: 链接已复制，请在浏览器打开

lineColor.description: The underscore color is the same as the color parameter color by default
lineColor.description_zh: 下划线颜色，默认同color参数颜色

text.description: The problem with hyperlinks, which are not passed in in the form of slots, is because the color cannot be modified under nvue
text.description_zh: 超链接的问题，不使用slot形式传入，是因为nvue下无法修改颜色
